about.title: About
about.content: Engineer at a global IT company. I build web apps and tools as a hobby.

disclaimer: [Disclaimer] This is a personal hobby portfolio. Opinions are my own and do not represent my employer.

home.about_content:
Working as an engineer at a global IT company.
Outside of work, I enjoy building things as a personal hobby.

This site serves as a log of my hobby projects and engineering insights.
home.hero_tagline:
A personal hobby portfolio
exploring technology and building things

about_page.title: About Studio344
about_page.tagline: A personal hobby account for someone who loves technology and building things.
about_page.mission_desc:
Studio344 is a personal hobby account for someone who loves technology and building things.
It's a space where I freely experiment with interesting tech and enjoy personal development, separate from work.

If something looks fun, I just start building it.
With that mindset, I casually create web apps, tools, and whatever else catches my interest.
about_page.profile_desc:
Working as an engineer at a global IT company.

In my free time, I tinker with technologies that catch my eye (React, Next.js, WebGL, etc.)
and build small tools to solve everyday inconveniences.
about_page.philosophy_desc:
Rather than aiming for perfection, I prefer to just make something that works first.
Because it's a hobby, I can challenge new things without worrying about failure.

projects_page.title: All Projects
projects_page.desc: A list of hobby projects built under Studio344.

portfolio_page.title: Portfolio
portfolio_page.subtitle: An immersive portfolio site featuring Bento Grid design
portfolio_page.feature1_desc: Built with pure JavaScript and CSS only, without React or Vue. Achieved near-perfect Lighthouse scores with ultra-fast load times.
portfolio_page.feature2_desc: Linking CSS variables with JS to create a spotlight effect that follows mouse movement and noise textures via SVG filters.
portfolio_page.feature3_desc: Smooth Japanese/English language switching powered by the i18next library. Designed with global content delivery in mind.
portfolio_page.design_desc: Designed with the concept of being modern and futuristic while maintaining information readability. Adopting the trending Bento Grid layout to balance accessibility and visual beauty.
portfolio_page.tech_intro: Built on web standards without framework dependencies. Lightweight yet capable of rich visual expression.
portfolio_page.tech_html: HTML5 / CSS3: Semantic markup with CSS variables, Grid, and Flexbox for responsive layouts.
portfolio_page.tech_js: Vanilla JavaScript: All features built with plain JS. Zero bundle size overhead.
portfolio_page.tech_gsap: GSAP + ScrollTrigger: Scroll-driven animations and smooth transitions.
portfolio_page.tech_i18n: i18next: Bilingual (JA/EN) support with dynamic language switching — no page reload needed.
portfolio_page.tech_hosting: GitHub Pages: Zero-cost static hosting with custom domain + HTTPS.
portfolio_page.perf_desc: Thanks to the framework-free approach, the site achieves high Lighthouse scores. External dependencies are kept minimal for fast initial loads.
portfolio_page.perf_score: Lighthouse Score: 95+ (Performance / Accessibility / Best Practices / SEO)
portfolio_page.perf_deps: External Deps: GSAP + i18next only (no bundler configuration)

ucfitness_page.title: UCFitness
ucfitness_page.subtitle: A group fitness tracking platform powered by the Fitbit API
ucfitness_page.features_intro: UCFitness serves as the ultimate social fitness dashboard, offering three core features.
ucfitness_page.feature1_desc: Track rankings in real time. Compare steps and activity levels with colleagues and friends on a daily, weekly, and monthly basis.
ucfitness_page.feature2_desc: Join a group and compete in team battles. Compete not just on individual scores, but on the combined totals of your entire team.
ucfitness_page.feature3_desc: Unlock unique badges by reaching milestones or maintaining streaks. Visualize your achievements.
ucfitness_page.tech_intro: Built with a modern web technology stack for a fast and scalable application.
ucfitness_page.tech_frontend: Frontend Framework: Next.js (App Router) - Fast initial rendering with server components.
ucfitness_page.tech_ui: UI Library: TailwindCSS & Shadcn/UI - A beautiful and consistent design system.
ucfitness_page.tech_auth: Authentication: OAuth 2.0 (Fitbit Web API) - Secure token management with automatic refresh.
ucfitness_page.tech_db: Database & Realtime: Supabase (PostgreSQL) - Used for real-time leaderboard updates (Live Subscription).
ucfitness_page.tech_deploy: Deployment: Vercel + Cloudflare - Global delivery via edge networks.
ucfitness_page.arch_desc: A custom caching layer is implemented to avoid hitting API limits as user count grows. Instead of making API calls per individual user request, a server-side worker periodically collects and aggregates data, updating the database via an asynchronous aggregation architecture.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.info_desc: Studio344 (hereinafter "this site") may collect user information primarily through the following methods.
privacy.info_cookies: Cookies: This site uses Google Analytics and Google AdSense to collect traffic data. This data is collected anonymously and does not identify individuals.

privacy.usage_analytics: Analysis to improve site usability and functionality
privacy.usage_ads: Delivery of relevant advertisements (e.g., Google AdSense)

privacy.contact_desc: For inquiries regarding this policy, please contact us via the Contact page.
